sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="asmt_metric"><asmt_metric action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><add_info_label>Additional Information</add_info_label><allow_add_info>false</allow_add_info><allow_not_applicable>true</allow_not_applicable><auto_gen>false</auto_gen><category display_value="INRY Generic Assessment">f88e8a101b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbb8</category><cond_question>always</cond_question><correct_answer/><correct_answer_checkbox/><correct_answer_choice/><correct_answer_template/><correct_answer_yesno/><datatype>attachment</datatype><default_value_field/><depends_on/><description/><details/><displayed_when/><displayed_when_checkbox/><displayed_when_template/><displayed_when_yesno/><duration/><mandatory>false</mandatory><max>10</max><max_weight/><method>assessment</method><metric_type display_value="INRY Generic Assessment">a5adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc3</metric_type><min>1</min><name>New Attachment</name><order>200</order><plugin/><question>Attach the appropriate evidence</question><randomize_answers>false</randomize_answers><reference_table/><scale>low</scale><scored>false</scored><script><![CDATA[// The following variables are available: // - primary: contains the sys_id of the assessable object to be evaluated // - string_result: the script sets the display string value for this metric to this variable // - actual_result: the script sets the actual value for this metric to this variable // - scaled_result: the script sets the scaled value (used in calculations) for this metric to this variable // // For example: // var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci'); // gr.addQuery('manufacturer', primary); // gr.query(); // actual_result = gr.getRowCount(); // string_result = actual_result + ''; // if (actual_result > 100) scaled_result = 5; // else scaled_result = 1;]]></script><source_field/><string_option>wide</string_option><sys_class_name>asmt_metric</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-17 09:22:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c98e46901b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New Attachment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management" source="sn_compliance">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>asmt_metric_c98e46901b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-21 06:09:07</sys_updated_on><template/><weight>10</weight></asmt_metric><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c98e46901b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbad"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: asmt_metric_31ad4a501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb98
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="asmt_metric"><asmt_metric action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><add_info_label>Additional Information</add_info_label><allow_add_info>false</allow_add_info><allow_not_applicable>true</allow_not_applicable><auto_gen>false</auto_gen><category display_value="Additional Details">b1ad4a501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb93</category><cond_question>always</cond_question><correct_answer/><correct_answer_checkbox>1</correct_answer_checkbox><correct_answer_choice/><correct_answer_template/><correct_answer_yesno>1</correct_answer_yesno><datatype>string</datatype><default_value_field/><depends_on/><description/><details/><displayed_when/><displayed_when_checkbox/><displayed_when_template/><displayed_when_yesno/><duration/><mandatory>false</mandatory><max>10</max><max_weight/><method>assessment</method><metric_type display_value="Additional Details">a5adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc3</metric_type><min>1</min><name>New String</name><order>100</order><plugin/><question>Review the control and Review additional information for this profile.</question><randomize_answers>false</randomize_answers><reference_table/><scale>low</scale><scored>false</scored><script><![CDATA[// The following variables are available: // - primary: contains the sys_id of the assessable object to be evaluated // - string_result: the script sets the display string value for this metric to this variable // - actual_result: the script sets the actual value for this metric to this variable // - scaled_result: the script sets the scaled value (used in calculations) for this metric to this variable // // For example: // var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci'); // gr.addQuery('manufacturer', primary); // gr.query(); // actual_result = gr.getRowCount(); // string_result = actual_result + ''; // if (actual_result > 100) scaled_result = 5; // else scaled_result = 1;]]></script><source_field/><string_option>wide</string_option><sys_class_name>asmt_metric</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-17 09:18:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>31ad4a501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb98</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New String</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management" source="sn_compliance">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>asmt_metric_31ad4a501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb98</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-17 09:18:52</sys_updated_on><template/><weight>10</weight></asmt_metric><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=31ad4a501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb98"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a1adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_compliance_control</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Auto business rule for Assessments</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
    var ga = new GlideAggregate('sn_compliance_control');
    ga.addQuery('sys_id', current.sys_id);
    ga.addEncodedQuery('active=true^EQ');
    ga.addAggregate('COUNT');
    ga.query();
    if (ga.next() && ga.getAggregate('COUNT') > 0)
       new global.AssessmentUtils().checkRecord(current, 'a5adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc3');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-17 09:18:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>a1adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto business rule for Assessments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management" source="sn_compliance">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a1adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-17 09:18:50</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a1adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="asmt_metric"><asmt_metric action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><add_info_label>Additional Information</add_info_label><allow_add_info>false</allow_add_info><allow_not_applicable>false</allow_not_applicable><auto_gen>false</auto_gen><category display_value="INRY Generic Assessment">f88e8a101b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbb8</category><cond_question>always</cond_question><correct_answer/><correct_answer_checkbox/><correct_answer_choice/><correct_answer_template/><correct_answer_yesno/><datatype>choice</datatype><default_value_field/><depends_on/><description/><details/><displayed_when/><displayed_when_checkbox/><displayed_when_template/><displayed_when_yesno/><duration/><mandatory>false</mandatory><max>2</max><max_weight/><method>assessment</method><metric_type display_value="INRY Generic Assessment">a5adc2501b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcbc3</metric_type><min>1</min><name>New Choice</name><order>100</order><plugin/><question>Have you reviewed the control and additional information for this profile?</question><randomize_answers>false</randomize_answers><reference_table/><scale>high</scale><scored>false</scored><script><![CDATA[// The following variables are available: // - primary: contains the sys_id of the assessable object to be evaluated // - string_result: the script sets the display string value for this metric to this variable // - actual_result: the script sets the actual value for this metric to this variable // - scaled_result: the script sets the scaled value (used in calculations) for this metric to this variable // // For example: // var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci'); // gr.addQuery('manufacturer', primary); // gr.query(); // actual_result = gr.getRowCount(); // string_result = actual_result + ''; // if (actual_result > 100) scaled_result = 5; // else scaled_result = 1;]]></script><source_field/><string_option>wide</string_option><sys_class_name>asmt_metric</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-17 09:22:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>788e46901b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb99</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New Choice</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management" source="sn_compliance">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GRC: Policy and Compliance Management">4a3281d053030200d23c9c25911c086f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>asmt_metric_788e46901b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb99</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Akhil.Yerrapragada</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-21 06:09:07</sys_updated_on><template/><weight>10</weight></asmt_metric><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=788e46901b65ff40377c99b4bd4bcb99"/></record_update>
